mapper.select:
select barcode,commonname, (select min(units) from sy_drugs a where a.barcode=x.barcode) units, (select name from keyvalue b where type='units' and code = (select min(units) from sy_drugs a where a.barcode=x.barcode) ) unitsname, (select min(specifications) from sy_drugs a where a.barcode=x.barcode) specifications, (select barcode2 from sy_drugs a where a.barcode=x.barcode) barcode2, sum(inquantity) total,sum(money) amount from sy_instorage_jz x where 1=1
and id like concat('%',#{instorage.id},'%')
and signtype = #{instorage.signtype}
and indate >= str_to_date(#{instorage.indate_begin}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and indate < date_add(str_to_date(#{instorage.indate_end}, '%Y-%m-%d'), interval 1 day)
and barcode = #{instorage.barcode_search}
group by barcode,commonname
